title: Montage Makers
body: So this is probably a stupid question, but is there any dedicated montage makers out there who would be interested in making a Thresh Montage on my behalf, im not skilled enough in video editing and etc to do it. Hit me up on here on add me on LoL client.

replies.body:
1. Send Me Your Video Clips
2. Send Me The Music You Want To Use
3. I Want Something In Exchange For Making You A Montage.

My payment is basically = Rp/Skins
I can make a thresh montage for you if you send me your games. As long as you credit me in your video and send me what music you want I'll happily do it for you. Add me if you want to discuss further
Added you mate, under a new username. MaximumWIfeSteal
I mean, you can try to contact ThePeacePigeon...

Montages are not my thing, I'm not that good at editing. 
I can only do small things.

I don't personally know of any montage makers except for Fitzky, even tho hes new to it.
And he doesn't play support.

I play support and thresh is my favorite.
I can try I just don't know how good its gonna be.
